casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. JOHNSON
v.
BUR. OF SENTENCE COMPUTATION 2019-0468 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 24, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On appellee's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed.

Appellant's motion to stay judgment of appellate court denied.
